General.Name: Shaanxi Ligeance Mineral Resources Co Ltd
General.Description: Ligeance Aerospace Technology Co.,Ltd. engages in the production and sales of aviation precision parts and structural parts. It offers various aircraft-related precision parts, structural parts, etc., including the surface of aircraft wings, engine related parts, take-off and landing equipment, oil pump cover and other core components, wing spar, wing surface, wing spar, super large wing frame, aircraft floor beam and seat rail, etc. used in the wide-body/narrow-body commercial airliners, helicopters, engines, other aircraft, and industrial products. The company also provides value-added services comprising supporting logistics and express workshop services. In addition, it is involved in the mining, smelting, and sales of molybdenum ore, sulfur, rhenium, lead, and silver; and research and development of smelting technologies. The company was formerly known as Shaanxi Ligeance Mineral Resources Co., Ltd. Ligeance Aerospace Technology Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is based in Chengdu, China.

1.Name: Mr. Weijun  Zhao
1.Title: Deputy GM, Sec. of the Board & Director
